price: 110. Muusa sin Baaxó misrak sin yayyaaqem faxak macal yoo amrissaanaa maca yoh tascasseenii kay caagidik? iyye firqawni.
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
